description: This file defines the Express.js routes for managing 'budgets' in a backend application. It sets up API endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) for listing, creating, updating, and removing budgets. It also includes middleware authentication and Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles fetching and returning a list of budgets.

methods.name: createBudgetValidation
methods.description: Validates the input data for creating a new budget.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles creating a new budget after validation.

methods.name: updateBudgetValidation
methods.description: Validates input data for updating an existing budget.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles updating a specific budget by ID.

methods.name: idParamValidation
methods.description: Validates the ID parameter for routes that require it.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles deleting a budget by ID.
